location.data.dungeon.name: Dungeon
location.data.dungeon.reward.name: Dungeon Loot
location.data.dungeon.effect.assault: <style="status">Enter</style> to Battle with the Enemies lurking there and <style="status">Loot</style> their <style="value">Relic or Spell stash</style>. Your Followers will not participate and Night restrictions apply.
location.data.dungeon.effect.assault_con: When <style="status">Looted</style>, you can still Battle with new Enemies there but there won't be any more loot to be found.
location.data.dungeon.assault.title: Lurking Enemies
location.data.dungeon.assault.subtitle: Enter to Battle
location.data.dungeon.assault.label: Enter
